\usepackage{esint}
\usepackage{babel}
\begin{document}

\title{Homework 4: Integration by Parts}


\author{Alexander Gould, Section 3}

\maketitle
7.

\[
\int\cos x\left(x^{2}+2x\right)dx=\cos x\left(\frac{x^{3}}{3}+x^{2}\right)-\int\cos xdx=\boxed{\cos x\left(\frac{x^{3}}{3}+x^{2}\right)-\sin x+C}
\]


10.

\[
\int\sin^{-1}xdx=\boxed{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}+x\sin^{-1}x+C}
\]


11.

\[
\int\tan^{-1}4tdt=t\left(\tan^{-1}4t\right)-\int\frac{4t}{16t^{2}+1}=\boxed{t\left(\tan^{-1}4t\right)-\frac{\ln\left(16t^{2}+1\right)}{8}+C}
\]


15.

\[
\int\left(\ln x\right)^{2}dx=x\left(\ln x\right)^{2}-\int2\ln x=\boxed{x\left(\left(\ln x\right)^{2}-2\left(\ln x-1\right)\right)+C}
\]


18.

\[
\int e^{-\theta}\cos2\theta d\theta=\boxed{-\frac{e^{-x}\left(\cos2x-2\sin2x\right)+C}{5}}
\]


23.

\[
\int_{0}^{\frac{1}{2}}x\cos\pi xdx=x^{2}\cos\pi x-\int x\left(\cos\pi x-\pi x\sin\pi x\right)dx=\left.\frac{x\sin\pi x+}{\pi}\frac{\cos\pi x}{\pi^{2}}\right|_{0}^{\frac{1}{2}}=\boxed{\frac{\pi-2}{2\pi^{2}}}
\]


27.

\[
\int_{1}^{3}r^{3}\ln rdr=\frac{x^{4}\ln x}{4}-\int\frac{x^{3}}{4}dx=\frac{x^{4}\ln x}{4}-\frac{1}{4}\int x^{3}dx=\left.\frac{x^{4}\ln x}{4}-\frac{x^{4}}{16}\right|_{1}^{3}\approx\boxed{17.247}
\]


30.

\[
\int_{1}^{\sqrt{3}}\tan^{-1}\frac{1}{x}dx=x\left(\tan^{-1}\frac{1}{x}\right)-\int-\frac{x}{x^{2}+1}dx=\left.\left(x\left(\tan^{-1}\frac{1}{x}\right)-\frac{\ln\left(x^{2}+1\right)}{2}\right)\right|_{1}^{\sqrt{3}}=\boxed{\frac{\pi}{2\sqrt{3}}+\ln2}
\]


32{*}$\int_{1}^{2}\frac{\left(\ln x\right)^{2}}{x^{3}}dx=$

37{*}. Use substitution first

$\int\cos\sqrt{x}dx=$
